data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Alaves in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Barcelona's half?
In the minute 5, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Alaves.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Throw-in Alaves.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Barcelona's Ansu Fati breaks free at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Alaves to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jota for Alaves has been booked by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 16, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Alaves's area.
Edgar Mendez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Alaves.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Barcelona are coming forward and Antoine Griezmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Barcelona throw-in in Alaves's half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona just outside Alaves's area.
In the minute 22, Deyverson is booked for the home team.
Barcelona drive upfield and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Alaves defender.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Barcelona at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Rioja puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 33, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Alaves.
Frenkie De Jong (Barcelona) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 36, Alaves have a goal kick.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ximo Navarro.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a first change, with Martin Aguirregabiria replacing the possibly injured Ximo Navarro.
In the minute 42, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Lionel Messi of Barcelona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 44, Clement Lenglet (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Alaves.
In the minute 45, Alaves's Florian Lejeune gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
The away team replace Clement Lenglet with Pedri.
Miralem Pjanic is replacing Sergio Busquets for the away team.
In the minute 46, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a third substitution, with Trincao replacing Ousmane Dembele.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Barcelona drive forward through Lionel Messi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 49, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Throw-in Alaves.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Alaves advance rapidly upfield but Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez blows for offside.
Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Alaves.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Ansu Fati of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Alaves throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Joselu is replacing Deyverson for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
The home team have replaced Edgar Mendez with Tomas Tavares. This is the third substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Free kick in a good position for Barcelona!
Lionel Messi for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Alaves have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 62, At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Jota has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Antoine Griezmann is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Barcelona attack through Miralem Pjanic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 68, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Alaves a goal kick.
Joselu (Alaves) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Sergino Dest is replacing Jordi Alba for the away team.
In the minute 70, Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Barcelona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Alaves make their fourth substitution with Manu Garcia replacing Luis Rioja.
Pablo Machin is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio de Mendizorroza with Adrian Marin replacing Tomas Pina.
In the minute 75, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 78, Alaves needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
Martin Braithwaite is replacing Ansu Fati for Barcelona at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 80, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Barcelona push upfield but Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 83, Trincao (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Throw-in Alaves.
In the minute 85, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Barcelona are whistled for offside.
Alaves will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Barcelona.
In the minute 87, Alaves's Ruben Duarte has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Barcelona pushes forward through Sergino Dest, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 88, Barcelona's Miralem Pjanic is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona's Sergino Dest gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Barcelona's Miralem Pjanic misses with an attempt on goal.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Barcelona are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Alaves a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
